Who: DEEPSTRYKE, NIGHTRAZOR, PHOBIA, Rat Trap, Quickstride
Location: Some distance away from the Black Fortress

> No sooner does he cover his nose, Quickstride releases a large cloud of
> noxious fumes from his tail end which aleviates his bloat, enabling him to
> pick up his pace. A green cloud wafts upward.

As the gassy pod of smell began to ascend into the air, it was carried
by the wind, slightly disipating as it moved higher and higher into
the air. However it eventually reached to the hieght of the three
fliers, catching them full on as they moved through it.

"What is that vile odor?" said one of them said, the voice quiet and
low, almost a whisper. The black jet veered off to one side as it made
to circle around, its engines strangely quiet, even at the speeds they
were flying.

"No Nightrazor." came the command of the middle one, the one that
looked more like a weapons platform. "We have a mission to perform,
fall back in line."

"But Deepstryke, I believe it smells divine." said the red and white
jet, the voice definitely female, as it was voice dark and sultry. "It
could be useful under some circumstances."

"Later Phobia." The middle one said, obviously their leader. "Once
we've caught up with Cyclonus."

"You spoil all the fun." Phobia said playfully as she continued her flight.

By this time the black jet, Nightrazor had fallen back into position
and the three of them banked slightly, reorienting themselves on their
intended goal: the Black Fortress, and picked up speed.

(TAG)

Preston
